text: #EuropeanTravelBan might slow spread of #CoronaVirus short term but smacks of senior presidential aide #StephenMiller creepy Xenophobe who’s architect of our regressive immigration policies. Due respect to @realDonaldTrump but @JoeBiden seems to have better overview of crisis
